content.text:
Karen L. Haas, Clerk of the House, reported and found truly enrolled 
a bill of the House of the following title, which was thereupon signed 
by the Speaker:

       H.R. 3031. An act to amend title 5, United States Code, to 
     provide for flexibility in making withdrawals from a Thrift 
     Savings Plan account, and for other purposes.
content.speaker: Unknown
